titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: DURATION OF INTERNET ENABLED THERAPY IMPROVING ACCESS TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPIES CARE PROFESSIONAL CLINICAL TIME - Description

body.p: DURATION OF INTERNET ENABLED THERAPY IMPROVING ACCESS TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPIES CARE PROFESSIONAL CLINICAL TIME Â is the duration of clinical time in minutes spent by the Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Care Professional supporting Internet Enabled Therapy for the PATIENT within the specified time period.
